summary: Completed frontend testing of ContentManagement.jsx refactor. All 4 tabs (Packages, PARQ Questions, Health Questions, Legal Policies) working correctly. Tab switching works without errors. No console errors detected.
critical_code_review_comments: ContentManagement.jsx successfully refactored from 1200+ line monolith to container component
PackageManagement.jsx properly handles package CRUD operations with modals
QuestionManagement.jsx reusable for both PARQ and Health questions with type prop
PolicyManagement.jsx handles all 4 policy types with proper state management
All child components receive proper props (packages, questions, onRefresh, setAlertModal, setConfirmModal)
Tab switching works correctly with activeTab state
context_for_next_testing_agent: ContentManagement refactor fully tested. Key test scenarios: 1) Admin Content Management page loads at /admin/content - PASS, 2) Packages tab displays 3 packages with Add Package button - PASS, 3) PARQ Questions tab displays 5 questions with Add Question button - PASS, 4) Health Questions tab displays 3 questions with type badges - PASS, 5) Legal Policies tab shows 4 policy type buttons (Cancellation, Terms, Privacy, Cookie) - PASS, 6) Tab switching works correctly - PASS, 7) No console errors - PASS

features_tested.feature: Admin Content Management page loads at /admin/content
features_tested.notes: Page loads with Content Management header and 4 tabs

features_tested.feature: Packages tab displays and allows viewing existing packages
features_tested.notes: 3 packages displayed with name, price, description, features, and action buttons (Deactivate, Edit, Delete)

features_tested.feature: PARQ Questions tab displays questions list
features_tested.notes: 5 PARQ questions displayed with order numbers, question text, applicable packages, and edit/delete buttons

features_tested.feature: Health Questions tab displays questions list
features_tested.notes: 3 health questions displayed with type badges (text, multiple_choice) and edit/delete buttons

features_tested.feature: Legal Policies tab shows policy type selector
features_tested.notes: 4 policy type buttons visible: Cancellation Policy, Terms of Service, Privacy Policy, Cookie Policy

features_tested.feature: Tab switching works correctly between all 4 tabs
features_tested.notes: Clicking each tab switches content correctly, active tab is highlighted

features_tested.feature: No console errors when using the Content Management page
features_tested.notes: No JavaScript console errors detected during tab navigation
